body_html:
Hi @buaaliyi

If only single frame can be decoded, what's the point of using GIF? It will be really helpful, if this can be extended to load all frames. In that case, you may need to take care of the "coalesce". I am happy to help in this effort.

body:
Hi @buaaliyi 

If only single frame can be decoded, what's the point of using GIF? It will be really helpful, if this can be extended to load all frames. In that case, you may need to take care of the "coalesce". I am happy to help in this effort.
